comments:
Scenario: evaluate expressions from the scrapbook. 

The expression pane ceases to display expressions after "a while" (one-two 
days of not so intensive work). The details pane will show the value of the 
expression, but the upper pane is white (but not empty, "Select all" from the 
popup menu will show all expression values in the details pane). Restarting 
the IDE cures this condition.

build 2.1-M4, platform WXP, no stactrace

Not quite, just keep evaluating expressions from the scrapbook for a day or 
two. The variables view etc will work fine.

I don't know if this is related. I don't get it everytime.

It looks like the Java project could not be resolved for the element we were 
trying to render. However, this NPE appears fixed in the latest code base 
(looking at the code that resolves a java project).
